name: BLACK+DECKER 20V MAX* Cordless Drill/Driver
description: Ideal for drilling into wood, metal plastic and all screw driving tasks. Lithium Ion Technology & 20V MAX: Lighter, more compact, no memory, longer life.

name: BLACK+DECKER 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker
description: QuickTouch Programming - Easily set the time and program the auto brew feature with large, clearly marked buttons.

name: BLACK+DECKER Electric Pressure Washer, 1600 PSI
description: 1600 PSI and 1.2 GPM for efficient cleaning power. Ideal for cleaning driveways, decks, and patio furniture.

name: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster Oven
description: EvenToast Technology - The toaster oven interior is specially designed for even toasting of up to 4 slices of bread at a time.

name: BLACK+DECKER Mouse Detail Sander
description: Compact design for sanding in tight spaces. High performance dust collection with micro-filtration.

name: BLACK+DECKER dustbuster AdvancedClean Cordless Handheld Vacuum
description: Rotating slim nozzle targets dirt in tight spaces. Cyclonic action spins dust and debris away from the filter.

name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill Combo Kit
description: Compact, lightweight design fits into tight areas. High performance motor delivers 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power ability.

name: Bosch 7.0 Amp Top-Handle Jigsaw
description: Tool-less blade change system. Ambidextrous lock-on button for steady long cuts and user comfort and control.

name: Ninja Professional Countertop Blender
description: Total Crushing Technology delivers unbeatable power with blades that pulverize and crush through ice, whole fruits and vegetables in seconds.

name: Karcher K1700 Electric Power Pressure Washer
description: 1700 PSI, 1.2 GPM. Includes 3 nozzles: Turbo nozzle for maximum cleaning power on stubborn areas, 15Â° all-purpose nozzle and detergent nozzle.
